Action.Description: Mark Players (Change JSON payload to change which marks are used)

Trigger.Name: Automark Sides
Trigger.Description: Marks one side with attack1-4, and the other with chain1-3+triangle. If it's Remote Glitch, reverses the order of one of the sides. No thinking, 0 braincells, just line up in order on each side, gg ez. Just remember if it's stay far or stay close.

Action.JsonPayloadExpression: {"version":1,"id":0,"type":"Bundle","payload":[{"id":1,"type":"ExecuteCommand","payload":{"command":"/mk clear <1>"}},{"id":2,"type":"ExecuteCommand","payload":{"command":"/mk clear <2>"}},{"id":3,"type":"ExecuteCommand","payload":{"command":"/mk clear <3>"}},{"id":4,"type":"ExecuteCommand","payload":{"command":"/mk clear <4>"}},{"id":5,"type":"ExecuteCommand","payload":{"command":"/mk clear <5>"}},{"id":6,"type":"ExecuteCommand","payload":{"command":"/mk clear <6>"}},{"id":7,"type":"ExecuteCommand","payload":{"command":"/mk clear <7>"}},{"id":8,"type":"ExecuteCommand","payload":{"command":"/mk clear <8>"}}]}

^(Alectryon|Cornu|Dernière flamme de Dalvag|Fondu|Forneus|Girtab|Griffe des enfers magitek|Guédé Ti-Malice|Kurrea|Maahes|Marberry|Marraco|Nahn|Pampa ballerine|Unktehi|Vogaal Ja|Zanig'oh)$
